goals__remit:
We provide professional services to the mining, minerals, and extractive industries. 
Our consultant services include: 
 
•    Metallic Minerals 
•    Precious Metals 
•    Rare Earth Elements 
•    minerals policies within the context of the European Union new approach on the European mining industry and metals (E.U policies on European innovation partnership on raw materials) 
Our expertise and capability are focused mainly in: 
•    Exploration, planning and permitting procedures 
•    Mineral resources assessment 
•    Minerals policies 
Our core services include: 
•    Strategic advisory services for decision-making in investments in the minerals industry  
•    Exploration services for resource assessment and evaluation 
•    Permitting services for all stages and metallic  minerals and mining activities 
 Our exploration-related services include: 
•    Exploration management services include advice on mineral targeting  
•    Geological data analysis, providing resource and reserve calculation
